short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes Chinese results when searching for Japanese text on Google.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removes Chinese results when searching for Japanese text on Google. This works by checking each search result and seeing whether there are any Japanese (Hiragana and Katakana) characters and removing results that don't contain them. 

IMPORTANT: If results are removed when you don't want them to, disable the extension in your extensions manager. 

Future Goals:
Better performance, pausing in-extension, better detection of Chinese-only results
